title: Blessing of the determined brain
description: Choose two questions in different categories. The seekers must ask those questions first before asking anything else in the category.

title: Blessing of the frozen dot
description:
Place a point on the map at least 1,000 feet from where the seekers are currently standing.

If, in exactly 15 minutes, they are within 250 feet of that point, they must consume ice cream before asking another question
requirement: Seekers must be at least 10 miles (16km) away.

title: Blessing of the inviting door
description: For the next hour, seekers must roll a 4 or higher to walk by any doorway to a public location within 10 feet. Else, stay at the location for at least 5 minutes before continuing.

title: Curse of public opinion
description: Before asking another question, seekers must visit any public point of interest without doing any research. If the location has a Google review of under 4.0, or has less than 10 reviews, you are awarded an extra 30 minutes.
requirement: The seekers' next question is free.

title: Curse of the photographer
description: For the next hour, seekers must take a picture of where they will be within the minute in order to move. If seekers move without taking a picture, or are not at where the picture shows within the minute, you are awarded an extra 30 minutes.
requirement: The seekers' next question is free.
